REL_HEIGHT - Static variable in class main.Main
 
RelCoordinates - Class in main
Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
Class Description:

Used to calculation relative position of a point.
Calculates the location with 224 pixel height has base.
RelCoordinates() - Constructor for class main.RelCoordinates
 
removeAura() - Method in class main.sprites.Mario
Used to remove Aura for Mario (Mario must have atleast second level powerup for this to take effect).
removeEvents() - Method in class main.Main
Called during final flag pole sequence.
Used to disable player from controlling Mario.
removePowerupEffect() - Method in class main.Main
Removes the powerup effect.
resetAura() - Method in class main.sprites.Mario
To change White Aura to Golden Aura.
rightCollide(boolean) - Method in class main.sprites.MotionStageSprite
If the right of Sprite collided.
